div.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Jan. 3, 1895. FOUR PLAYS TO BE PRESENTED BY SCHOOL CHILDREN

body.p: The school children of St. Mary of Perpetual Help Parish, under the supervision of the Franciscan Sisters, are to present four plays, two in English [titles not given] and two in Polish; namely, "Lakomy Doktor" (The Greedy Doctor) and "Maly Nauczyciel" (The Little Teacher), on January 6 at Kaiser's Hall. The proceeds are to go toward the building of a new parish school. Besides the short plays, songs, drills and recitations will be given. All those wishing to enjoy a pleasant evening and see what the parish school children can do are cordially invited to attend. The program will start at 7:30 P. M.
